name: MUSIKEA
description:
A very simple and goofy puzzle game that mixes the famous Swedish brand kit-building system with a musical twist. Play using the numbers from 1 to 9 on your Keyboard and clicking with your mouse.

Created by 

@FanghGD - Developer
Marine L.G. - Developper
@Nihililith - Sound Design
@PXLcat - 2D and 3D Art
